terms.label: PGM
terms.description-ja: 即時文法と調整文法の2層モデル。人間の言語使用のプロセス的構造に着目した文法理論。
terms.description-en: A two-layer model of Immediate and Adjustive Grammar, focusing on the processual nature of language use.

terms.label: PG-Gloss
terms.description-ja: 逐語訳に基づく2層構造のgloss記述法。句と語の意味・文法をJSON形式で明示。
terms.description-en: A two-tiered glossing method based on strict literal translation, using phrase and word-level annotation in structured JSON.

terms.label: glossary-abbreviations
terms.description-ja: LOC, PST, GEN などの略語とその意味を整理した一覧。
terms.description-en: A structured list of gloss abbreviations such as LOC, PST, GEN with their definitions.

terms.label: notes-ja / notes-en
terms.description-ja: 語り手の効果、発話構造、文体的特徴を記述する注釈。
terms.description-en: Annotations describing discourse effects, utterance structure, and stylistic features.

terms.label: gloss-notes-ja / gloss-notes-en
terms.description-ja: gloss の選択・解釈・活用形などに関する補足的注記。
terms.description-en: Supplemental notes on gloss selection, interpretation, and inflectional analysis.

terms.label: adjusted-expression
terms.description-ja: 調整文法に基づいて整えられた文法的・語用的表現。
terms.description-en: Expressions formulated through adjustive grammar for stylistic, polite, or public effects.

terms.label: tasuki-gake effect
terms.description-ja: 即時文法と調整文法が交差して文体効果を生む現象。
terms.description-en: A stylistic phenomenon where immediate and adjustive grammar intersect, producing narrative or rhetorical effects.
